Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that George Soros was indicted for tampering with voting machines, when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no credible evidence or sources provided to back up the allegation against George Soros.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that George Soros was involved in tampering with voting equipment based on a rumor about his ownership of a particular brand of voting equipment, which has been proven to be false.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, as it is a doctored photograph taken at the sentencing of a hacker who stole from Soros' charitable foundation.
